name: slack_chat_postMessage
description: Send a message to a channel

channel.description: Channel, private group, or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

text.description: text describing the content of the message

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_chat_delete_update
description: Delete or update a particular message from a particular channel

channel.description: ID of the channel containing the message. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_archive
description: Archive or delete a channel or a conversation

channel.description: ID of the channel or conversation to be archived. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_create
description: Create a new channel or a conversation

name.description: Name of the channel or conversation.

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_history
description: Get a list of messages and events from a channel

channel.description: ID of the channel or conversation for message retrieval. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a 'next_cursor' attribute returned by a previous request's 'response_metadata'. Default value fetches the first 'page' of the collection.

latest.description: Only messages before this Unix timestamp will be included in results. Default is the current time.

oldest.description: Only messages after this Unix timestamp will be included in results. Default is 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached. Default is 100.

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_list
description: List all channels in a Slack team

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a 'next_cursor' attribute returned by a previous request's 'response_metadata'. Default value fetches the first 'page' of the collection.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached. Default is 100.

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_members
description: Retrieve members of a conversation or channel

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a 'next_cursor' attribute returned by a previous request's 'response_metadata'. Default value fetches the first 'page' of the collection.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached. Default is 100.

channel.description: ID of the channel or conversation from which members should be retrieved. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

channel.description: ID of the channel or conversation to rename. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

name.description: New name of the channel or conversation

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name

name: slack_conversations_replies
description: Retrieve a thread of messages or replies posted to a conversation or channel

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a 'next_cursor' attribute returned by a previous request's 'response_metadata'. Default value fetches the first 'page' of the collection.

latest.description: Only messages before this Unix timestamp will be included in results. Default is the current time.

oldest.description: Only messages after this Unix timestamp will be included in results. Default is 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached. Default is 100.

channel.description: ID of the channel or conversation to fetch thread from. Must be alphanumeric i.e., must contain numbers and alphabets only

ts.description: Unique identifier of either a threads parent message or a message in the thread. ts must be the timestamp of an existing message with 0 or more replies. If there are no replies then just the single message referenced by ts will return - it is just an ordinary, unthreaded message

method.description: Slack HTTP API method to call

URL.description: Full slack URL of the HTTP API method, format: https://slack.com/api/method-name
